feed.subtitle: Room 623, N1 Kim Beang-Ho Kim Sam-Youl ITC Building, KAIST, 291 Daehak-ro, Yuseong-gu, Daejeon 34141, South Korea

entry.title: CS374 Introduction to HCI
entry.content: This course introduces fundamental principles, techniques, and methods for designing, prototyping, and evaluating user interfaces.
entry.summary: This course introduces fundamental principles, techniques, and methods for designing, prototyping, and evaluating user interfaces.

entry.title: CS492 Trust & Safety Engineering and Practice

link.title: CS492 Trust & Safety Engineering and Practice

entry.content: This course introduces the rapidly emerging professional field of Trust and Safety, which every major social media company—such as Instagram, Slack, Discord, Twitch, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube—has dedicated teams for, as do companies like OpenAI, which provide services with significant safety concerns. Trust and Safety is an interdisciplinary profession where engineers work together with policy teams and communications professionals to answer difficult questions.
entry.summary: This course introduces the rapidly emerging professional field of Trust and Safety, which every major social media company—such as Instagram, Slack, Discord, Twitch, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube—has dedicated teams for, as do companies like OpenAI, which provide services with significant safety concerns.
